title: Mystery and Suspense at the Cavendish Mansion
description: Elizabeth is a 16 years old orphan, that receives unusual new: she is the only inheritor of a mansion, situated in the Amazonian Rain Forest, belonging to an English nobleman. Together with her friend Fisto, that hides a secret she will take over the fortune, she will get involved in a series of strange events, and she will discover that she is part of a great conspiracy about human greed, supernatural and mystery.
author: Waldon Volpiceli
